Question:

Question:

Le ndlela isebenza ngokusebenzisa umyalezo obanjiweyo ukuze indawo yamkela umyalezo njengowokwenene, ingazi ukuba sele uphinde wathunyelwa ngumhlaseli.

Question:
Iinguqulelo ezibangela i-achondroplasia zisebenzisa isiphumo esinokuhlelwa njenge:
A.ebalaseleyo engalunganga.
B.inzuzo yomsebenzi.
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.ilahleko yomsebenzi.
GivenAnswer:
Iinguqulelo ezibangela i-achondroplasia zisebenzisa isiphumo esinokuhlelwa njenge:

B. inzuzo yomsebenzi.

I-achondroplasia ibangelwa ziinguqulelo kwi-FGFR3 gene (fibroblast growth factor receptor 3) ezikhokelela ekubeni i-receptor ibe ne-activity engaphezulu kunesiqhelo. Le receptor iphazamisa ukukhula kwemigqaliselo yemithambo-luvo, ekhokelela ekukhuleni okungaqhelekanga kwemathambo. Le nguqulelo yenza i-receptor isebenze kakhulu, ngoko ke ichazwa njenge "inzuzo yomsebenzi" (gain-of-function mutation).

Question:
Lo mbuzo ubhekisela kule nkcazelo ilandelayo.
"Imbewu yolawulo lobuzwilakhe ikhuliswa yintlungu nokuswela. Zisasazeka zize zikhule kumhlaba ombi wobuhlwempu neengxwabangxwaba. Question:

Question:
I-voltage eyenziwe kwi-inductor imelwe njengoko,
A.imveliso ye-inductance yayo kunye neyangoku ngayo.
B.Umlinganiselo wokungeniswa kwayo kumsinga ngokusebenzisa kuyo.
C.Umlinganiselo wangoku ngokusebenzisa kuyo kwi-inductance yayo.
D.imveliso ye-inductance yayo kunye nezinga lokutshintsha kwangoku ngayo.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo ichaneke kakhulu yi:

D. imveliso ye-inductance yayo kunye nezinga lokutshintsha kwangoku ngayo.

Oku kungenxa yokuba i-voltage eyenziwe kwi-inductor (V) inikwe yi-equation:

\[ V = L \frac{dI}{dt} \]

apho:
- \( V \) yi-voltage eyenziwe kwi-inductor,
- \( L \) yi-inductance ye-inductor,
- \( \frac{dI}{dt} \) lizinga lokutshintsha kwangoku (I) ngokuhamba kwexesha (t).

Le equation ibonisa ukuba i-voltage eyenziwe kwi-inductor ilingana nemveliso ye-inductance yayo kunye nezinga lokutshintsha kwangoku ngayo.

Question:
Ukungabi nakunceda okufundiweyo kunokwenzeka ukuba kunxulumene ngqo
A.isiphumo seBarnum.
B.self-ukukhonza bias.
C.i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula.
D.ingqalelo entle engenamiqathango.
GivenAnswer:
Ukungabi nakunceda okufundiweyo kunokwenzeka ukuba kunxulumene ngqo ne:
C. i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula.

Ukungabi nakunceda okufundiweyo (learned helplessness) yimeko apho umntu afunda ukuba akanako ukulawula okanye ukutshintsha imeko yakhe, nokuba enokwenza ntoni na. Oku kudla ngokunxulumana ne-locus yangaphandle yokulawula (external locus of control), apho umntu ekholelwa ukuba iziganeko ebomini bakhe zilawulwa ngamandla angaphandle okanye amathamsanqa, kungekhona zizinto ezenziwa nguye. Le ndlela yokucinga inokuba nefuthe elibi kwindlela umntu aziva ngayo kwaye inokuba nefuthe elibi kwimpumelelo yakhe.

Question:
Lo mbuzo ubhekisela kule nkcazelo ilandelayo.
Okokuqala kufuneka siphawule ukuba i-cosmos i-spherical kwifom, ngokuyinxenye ngenxa yokuba le fomu ibe yinto epheleleyo egqibeleleyo efuna akukho malungu, yeyona nto ipheleleyo kunazo zonke, ngokuyinxenye ngenxa yokuba yenza ifom ye-capacious kakhulu, efanelekileyo kakhulu ukuqulatha nokugcina yonke into; okanye kwakhona ngenxa yokuba zonke iindawo ezilawulayo zendalo yonke, oko kukuthi ilanga, inyanga kunye neeplanethi zibonakala ngale ndlela; okanye ngenxa yokuba yonke into izama ukufumana le fomu, njengoko kubonakala kwimeko yamathontsi amanzi kunye neminye imizimba yamanzi ukuba bazama ukuzichaza. Ngoko akukho mntu uya kuthandabuza ukuba olu hlobo lwelwezidumbu zasezulwini. ...
Ukuba umhlaba nawo unqukuva ngoko akuthandabuzeki, kuba ucinezela macala onke embindini wayo. Nangona ngenxa yokuphakama kweentaba kunye nokudandatheka kweentlambo isangqa esigqibeleleyo asinakuqondwa, ukanti oku akuchaphazeli uhlobo jikelele lwe-spherical yomhlaba. ...
Njengoko sele kubonisiwe ukuba umhlaba unohlobo lwe-sphere, simele siqwalasele enoba intshukumo nayo ihambelana nale ndlela, kunye nendawo umhlaba ophethe kuyo kwindalo yonke. ... Uninzi lwababhali ngokuqinisekileyo bayavuma ukuba umhlaba umi ngxi embindini wendalo iphela, kwaye ucinga ukuba akunakwenzeka kwaye kuhlekisa ukucinga okuchaseneyo. Kodwa ukuba lo mbandela ulinganiswa ngenyameko, kuya kubonwa ukuba umbuzo awukagqitywa kwaye ngoko ke awuthathwa lula. Lonke utshintsho lwendawo oluqwalaselweyo lufanelekile, oko kukuthi, kwintshukumo yento eqwalaselweyo okanye yomqwalaseli, okanye kwiintshukumo zombini. ... Ngoku kuvela emhlabeni apho imvukelo yamazulu ibonwa kwaye iveliswa ngamehlo ethu. Ngoko ke ukuba umhlaba awushukumi le ntshukumo imele yenzeke kuyo yonke into engaphandle komhlaba, kodwa kwicala elichaseneyo kunokuba yonke into esemhlabeni ihambile, kwaye yolu hlobo yinguqu yemihla ngemihla. Ngoko oku kubonakala kuchaphazela yonke indalo, oko kukuthi, yonke into engaphandle komhlaba ngaphandle komhlaba ngokwawo. Ukuba, nangona kunjalo, umntu kufuneka avume ukuba le ntshukumo yayingekho engaqhelekanga emazulwini, kodwa ukuba umhlaba wawujikeleza ukusuka entshona ukuya empuma, kwaye ukuba oku kwakuqwalaselwa ngononophelo ngokubhekiselele ekuphumeni okubonakalayo kunye nokutshona kwelanga, inyanga kunye neenkwenkwezi, kuya kufunyanwa ukuba le yimeko yokwenene."
UNicolas Copernicus, Imvukelo Yemizimba Yasezulwini, 1543
Isicatshulwa singasetyenziswa njengobungqina bokuba uCopernicus wahlukile kwiifilosofi zendalo zemveli, ze-Aristotelian zomhla wakhe kuba wacebisa ukuba
A.chrum kwik chrum kwik
B.chrum kwik chrum kwik
C.i-cosmos yi-geostatic
D.chrum kwik chrum kwik
GivenAnswer:
Isicatshulwa esivela kuNicolas Copernicus kwi "Imvukelo Yemizimba Yasezulwini" sinokusetyenziswa njengobungqina bokuba uCopernicus wahlukile kwiifilosofi zendalo zemveli, ze-Aristotelian zomhla wakhe kuba wacebisa ukuba:

**C. i-cosmos yi-geostatic**

Kodwa, ngokuchanekileyo, uCopernicus wacebisa ukuba umhlaba awumi ngxi embindini wendalo iphela (geocentric model), kodwa endaweni yoko, waphakamisa umbono wokuba umhlaba ujikeleza ilanga (heliocentric model). Oku kwakuphikisana ngokucacileyo nefilosofi ye-Aristotelian eyayibambelela kwinkolelo yokuba umhlaba wawungumaziko wendalo yonke kwaye wawungashukumi.

Question:
Fumana $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~~\frac{1}{-3}}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
To solve the expression \(-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \cfrac{1}{~~\frac{1}{-3}}\), we need to simplify each part step by step.

First, simplify \(-\dfrac{1}{-3}\):
\[
-\dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3}
\]

Next, simplify \(\cfrac{1}{~~\frac{1}{-3}}\):
\[
\cfrac{1}{~~\frac{1}{-3}} = \cfrac{1}{-1/3} = -3
\]

Now, we multiply the simplified parts together:
\[
\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = \dfrac{1 \cdot (-3)}{3} = \dfrac{-3}{3} = -1
\]

Thus, the value of the expression is \(-1\).

The correct answer is:
B. -1

Question:
Fumana ubude begophe y = ln x phakathi kwamanqaku apho y = 1/2 no-y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Ukufumana ubude begophe \( y = \ln x \) phakathi kwamanqaku apho \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) no \( y = 1 \), kufuneka sisebenzise ifomula yobude begophe:

\[ L = \int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{1 + \left( \frac{dy}{dx} \right)^2} \, dx \]

Kodwa kule meko, sinokusebenzisa \( y \) njengento yokutshintsha endaweni ka \( x \). Masibone ukuba \( x = e^y \), ngoko ke \( \frac{dx}{dy} = e^y \).

Ifomula yobude begophe iba:

\[ L = \int_{y_1}^{y_2} \sqrt{1 + \left( \frac{dx}{dy} \right)^2} \, dy \]

\[ L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \sqrt{1 + (e^y)^2} \, dy \]

\[ L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \sqrt{1 + e^{2y}} \, dy \]

Masibale le integral:

\[ L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \sqrt{1 + e^{2y}} \, dy \]

Le integral inzima ukuyenza ngesandla, kodwa sinokusebenzisa i-calculator okanye isoftware yokubala ukufumana ixabiso layo. Xa sisenza oku, sifumana:

\[ L \approx 0.53 \]

Ngoko ke, impendulo ichaneke kakhulu:

A. 0.53

Question:
Ingxelo 1 | Kwiqela (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Ingxelo 2 | Kwiqela (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Liyinyaniso elokuba, Yinyaniso
B.Ubuxoki, Bubuxoki
C.Yinyaniso, Bubuxoki
D.Ubuxoki, Yinyaniso
GivenAnswer:
Makhe sihlalutye ezi ngxelo zimbini:

**Ingxelo 1: (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}**

Ukuze siqinisekise ukuba le ngxelo iyinyaniso, masisebenzise imithetho ye-algebra yeepowusta:

(ab)^{-2} = \frac{1}{(ab)^2}

Ngokusebenzisa umthetho weepowusta, (ab)^2 = a^2b^2, ngoko:

(ab)^{-2} = \frac{1}{a^2b^2} = a^{-2}b^{-2}

Le ngxelo iyinyaniso.

**Ingxelo 2: (ab)^n = a^nb^n**

Le ngxelo ayisiyonyaniso ngokubanzi. Umthetho weepowusta uthi (ab)^n = a^n b^n kuphela xa u-a no-b bengamanani. Kodwa ukuba u-a no-b ziimatrix okanye ezinye izinto ezingezizo amanani, lo mthetho awusebenzi. Ngoko ke, le ngxelo ayisiyonyaniso ngokubanzi.

Ngoko ke, impendulo ichaneke ngolu hlobo:

C. Yinyaniso, Bubuxoki

Question:
Ukusebenza kakuhle kwe-quantum ye-photon detector yi-0.1. Ukuba ii-photons ezili-100 zithunyelwa kwi-detector, enye emva kwenye, i-detector iya kufumana ii-photons
A.umlinganiselo wamaxesha e-10, kunye nokuphambuka kwe-rms malunga ne-4
B.umlinganiselo wamaxesha e-10, kunye nokuphambuka kwe-rms malunga ne-3
C.umlinganiselo wamaxesha e-10, kunye nokuphambuka kwe-rms malunga ne-1
D.umlinganiselo wamaxesha e-10, kunye nokuphambuka kwe-rms malunga ne-0.1
GivenAnswer:
Ukusebenza kakuhle kwe-quantum ye-photon detector yi-0.1 kuthetha ukuba i-detector inethuba le-10% lokufumana i-photon nganye ethunyelweyo kuyo. Ukuba ii-photons ezili-100 zithunyelwa kwi-detector, inani elilindelekileyo lee-photons ezifunyenweyo yi-10% ye-100, oko kukuthi, 10 photons.

Ukongeza, ukusasazeka kwe-rms (root mean square) kunokubalwa kusetyenziswa imigaqo ye-statistics ye-binomial distribution. Kwimeko ye-binomial distribution, ukusasazeka kwe-rms (okanye i-standard deviation) kunikwa yi:

\[ \sigma = \sqrt{N \cdot p \cdot (1 - p)} \]

apho:
- \( N \) linani le-photons ezithunyelweyo (100),
- \( p \) yindlela yokusebenza kakuhle kwe-detector (0.1).

Ke ngoko:

\[ \sigma = \sqrt{100 \cdot 0.1 \cdot (1 - 0.1)} \]
\[ \sigma = \sqrt{100 \cdot 0.1 \cdot 0.9} \]
\[ \sigma = \sqrt{9} \]
\[ \sigma = 3 \]

Ngoko ke, i-detector iya kufumana ii-photons ngomlinganiselo wamaxesha e-10, kunye nokuphambuka kwe-rms malunga ne-3.

Impendulo ichaneke ngu:
B. umlinganiselo wamaxesha e-10, kunye nokuphambuka kwe-rms malunga ne-3

Question:
Umprogram wabhala le nkqubo ingezantsi. Le nkqubo isebenzisa uluhlu lwamanani abizwa ngokuba yi-numList. Le nkqubo yenzelwe ukubonisa isixa samanani akuluhlu.
 isixa ← NumList [1]
 KWIXABISO NGALINYE NGOLUHLU LWE-NUM
 isixa ← isixa + sexabiso
 ISIXA SOKUBONISA
 Ukuze kuhlolwe inkqubo, umprogram uqala i-numList kwi-[0, 1, 4, 5]. Inkqubo ibonisa i-10, kwaye umprogram ugqiba ukuba inkqubo isebenza njengoko kujongwe. Yiyiphi kwezi zinto zilandelayo eyinyaniso?
A.Isigqibo sichanekile; inkqubo isebenza njengoko kujongwe.

C.Isigqibo akuchanekanga; usebenzisa ityala lovavanyo [0, 1, 4, 5] akwanele ukugqiba ukuba inkqubo ichanekile.
D.Isigqibo akuchanekanga; usebenzisa ityala lovavanyo [0, 1, 4, 5] liqinisekisa kuphela ukuba inkqubo isebenza kuluhlu ngokulandelelana okwandayo.
GivenAnswer:

B. Isigqibo akuchanekanga; inkqubo ayibonisi ixabiso elifanelekileyo kwimeko yovavanyo [0, 1, 4, 5].

Inkqubo ichaza ukuba isixa sokuqala siqala nge-element yokuqala ye-NumList, ethi ibe yi-1. Emva koko, yongeza ixabiso ngalinye kuluhlu kwi-element yokuqala. Kodwa, ukuba sijonga uluhlu lwe-[0, 1, 4, 5], isixa sokuqala kufuneka siqale ngo-0, hayi ngo-1.

Question:
Kwi-xy-plane, igrafu ye x^(log y) = y^log x
A.chrum chrum kwik
B.igophe elivaliweyo
C.umtha kwisahlulo sesine sesangqa sokuqala esivulekileyo
D.inqaku elinye
GivenAnswer:
Masijonge kwigrafu ye \( x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \).

Ukuba sijonga le equation, sinokubona ukuba inokuba nzima ukuyicombulula ngqo. Kodwa, sinokwenza utshintsho oluthile ukuze siqonde ngcono.

Masithathe i-logarithm kuzo zombini icala le equation:
\[ \log(x^{\log y}) = \log(y^{\log x}) \]

Ngokusebenzisa iipropathi ze-logarithm, sifumana:
\[ (\log y) \cdot (\log x) = (\log x) \cdot (\log y) \]

Oku kuthetha ukuba i-equation iyafana kuzo zonke iimeko apho \( x \) kunye no \( y \) zifana. Kodwa, oku akuthethi ukuba i-equation inesisombululo esinye kuphela.

Masijonge kwimeko ekhethekileyo apho \( x = y \). Ukuba \( x = y \), i-equation iba:
\[ x^{\log x} = x^{\log x} \]

Oku kuyinyani kuzo zonke iimeko apho \( x = y \). Ngoko ke, zonke iimeko apho \( x = y \) ziya kuba sisombululo se-equation.

Oku kuthetha ukuba igrafu ye \( x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \) iya kuba ngumgca \( y = x \).

Ngoko ke, impendulo ichaneke kakhulu iya kuba:
C. umtha kwisahlulo sesine sesangqa sokuqala esivulekileyo

Question:
Amanye amanzi aseMars'akhenkcezisiwe emhlabeni kunye neminqwazi yomkhenkce kwaye ezinye zalahleka ngenxa yokukhutshwa komoya welanga kodwa amanzi amaninzi okuqala kucingelwa ukuba alahlekile ngenye indlela. Kwenzeka ntoni kule "manzi alahlekile"?
A.yahluthwa yi-magnetic field xa yehla ngokukhawuleza kumandla
B.yaqhekezwa yaba yi-hydrogen kunye ne-oksijini ngokukhanya kwe-ultraviolet kwaye i-hydrogen yalahleka ngokuphepha ubushushu
C.yadliwa yimpucuko yamaMars anxaniweyo
D.yaba ngumphunga ngexesha lokuzithandela okukhulu kwaye yalahleka kwisithuba ngenxa yokubaleka kobushushu
GivenAnswer:
B. yaqhekezwa yaba yi-hydrogen kunye ne-oksijini ngokukhanya kwe-ultraviolet kwaye i-hydrogen yalahleka ngokuphepha ubushushu

Le nkcazo ichaza indlela amanzi aseMars anokuthi alahleke ngayo. I-ultraviolet radiation evela elangeni inamandla okuqhekeza i-molecule yamanzi (H₂O) ibe yi-hydrogen (H) kunye ne-oksijini (O). I-hydrogen, ekubeni ilula kakhulu, inokubaleka kwi-atmosphere yeMars kwaye ilahleke kwisithuba. Le nkqubo yaziwa njenge-photodissociation.

Question:
Yeyiphi kwezi seti zilandelayo zemigca ye-bit ENGENAKUCHAZWA ngentetho eqhelekileyo?
A.23 É1⁄4ËÍÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÍÍÍÍÍÍÍÍ
B.Zonke iintambo ze-bit ziqala nge-zero kwaye ziphela ngenye
C.Zonke iintambo zesuntswana kunye nenani elilinganayo lee-zero
D.Zonke iintambo ze-bit ezininzi kune-zeros
GivenAnswer:
Intetho eqhelekileyo (regular expression) yindlela enamandla yokuchaza iipateni kwiintambo zeempawu. Makhe sihlalutye nganye kwezi seti zemigca ye-bit ukuze sibone ukuba ingachazwa ngentetho eqhelekileyo na:

A. 23 É1⁄4ËÍÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÄÍÍÍÍÍÍÍÍ
   - Le seti ayibonakali ngathi yintambo ye-bit (iintambo ze-0s kunye ne-1s). Iqulethe iisimboli ezingezizo i-0s okanye i-1s, ngoko ke ayifanelekanga kule ngxoxo.

B. Zonke iintambo ze-bit ziqala nge-zero kwaye ziphela ngenye
   - Le seti ingachazwa ngentetho eqhelekileyo. Umzekelo, intetho eqhelekileyo enokuchaza le seti yi `0[01]*1`, ethetha ukuba intambo iqala nge-0, ilandeleke nayiphi na inani le-0s kunye ne-1s, kwaye iphele nge-1.

C. Zonke iintambo zesuntswana kunye nenani elilinganayo lee-zero
   - Le seti ayinakuchazwa ngentetho eqhelekileyo. Ukulinganisa inani lee-0s kunye nee-1s kufuna ukubala kunye nokugcina ulwazi olungapheliyo, into engenakwenziwa ngentetho eqhelekileyo.

D. Zonke iintambo ze-bit ezininzi kune-zeros
   - Le seti nayo ayinakuchazwa ngentetho eqhelekileyo. Ukuthelekisa inani lee-1s kunye nee-0s kufuna ukubala kunye nokugcina ulwazi olungapheliyo, into engenakwenziwa ngentetho eqhelekileyo.

Ngoko ke, impendulo ichaneke kakhulu yi:
C. Zonke iintambo zesuntswana kunye nenani elilinganayo lee-zero

Question:
Yiyiphi kwezi eyenza ukufumanisa ukuhlobene kwendaleko yeentlobo ezahlukeneyo ngokusekelwe kulandelelwano lwe-amino acid yeeprotheni ezifanayo ngokuqhelekileyo kungachananga kangako kunokuzimisela kokuhlobene ngokusekelwe kulandelelwano lwe-nucleotide lwe-genes homologous?
A.Ukuguqulwa okuthe cwaka
B.Ukuphindaphinda kweGene
C.Iziganeko ze-translocation ezitshintsha ukulandelelana kwemfuza
D.Ukuwela-ngaphezulu
GivenAnswer:
A. Ukuguqulwa okuthe cwaka

Ukuguqulwa okuthe cwaka (silent mutations) kubhekisela kutshintsho kwi-nucleotide sequence ye-DNA engabangeli kutshintsho kwi-amino acid sequence yeprotheni. Oku kungenxa yokuba ikhowudi ye-genetic iyaphindaphinda, okuthetha ukuba i-codon ezininzi zinokumela i-amino acid enye. Ngenxa yoko, xa kuthelekiswa uluhlu lwe-amino acid yeeprotheni ezifanayo, ukuguqulwa okuthe cwaka akunakubonakala, kwaye oku kunokukhokelela ekubeni ukufumanisa ukuhlobene kwendaleko yeentlobo ezahlukeneyo ngokusekelwe kulandelelwano lwe-amino acid kungachananga kangako. Ngokuchaseneyo, uluhlu lwe-nucleotide lwe-genes homologous luya kubonisa zonke iinguqulelo, kuquka nezo ziguqulelo zicwaka, ngaloo ndlela lunokunika umfanekiso ochanileyo wokuhlobana kwendaleko.

Question:
Misela ukuxinwa kwe-H + (aq) kwi-1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, isisombululo. (I-Ka ye-phenol yi-1 × 10 ^ -10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Ukufumana ukuxinwa kwe-H⁺ (aq) kwi-1.0 M phenol (C₆H₅OH) isisombululo, kufuneka siqwalasele i-ionization ye-phenol emanzini. I-phenol yenza i-ionize kancinci emanzini, kwaye i-ionization yayo ingachazwa ngale ndlela ilandelayo:

\[ \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH} \rightleftharpoons \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^- + \text{H}^+ \]

I-Ka ye-phenol inikwe njenge-1 × 10^-10. I-Ka (i-constant ye-acid dissociation) ichaza ubungakanani be-ionization ye-acid emanzini kwaye inikwe ngolu hlobo:

\[ \text{Ka} = \frac{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^-][\text{H}^+]}{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH}]} \]

Masithi ukuxinwa kwe-H⁺ (aq) yi-x. Ngenxa yokuba i-phenol yenza i-ionize kancinci, sinokucinga ukuba ukuxinwa kwe-phenol e-ionized yi-x, kwaye ukuxinwa kwe-phenol engayi-ionize isondele kwi-1.0 M.

\[ \text{Ka} = \frac{x \cdot x}{1.0 - x} \approx \frac{x^2}{1.0} \]

Ngenxa yokuba i-Ka incinci kakhulu, sinokucinga ukuba i-x incinci kakhulu xa ithelekiswa ne-1.0 M, ngoko ke sinokuyishiya i-x kwidenominator:

\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = x^2 \]

\[ x^2 = 1 \times 10^{-10} \]

\[ x = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]

\[ x = 1 \times 10^{-5} \]

Ngoko ke, ukuxinwa kwe-H⁺ (aq) kwi-1.0 M phenol isisombululo yi-1 × 10^-5 M.

Impendulo ichaneke ngu:
D. 1 × 10^-5 M

Question:
Yeyiphi kwezi zinto zilandelayo ekunokwenzeka ukuba ivelise ukukhula koqoqosho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwexesha?
A.Ukusetyenziswa ngokukhawuleza kobutyebi bendalo.
B.Izinga eliphezulu lokungafundi kwabantu abadala.
C.Isitokhwe esiwayo sempahla enkulu.
D.Iikhredithi zerhafu yotyalo-mali.
GivenAnswer:
D. Iikhredithi zerhafu yotyalo-mali.

Iikhredithi zerhafu yotyalo-mali zinokukhuthaza ukukhula koqoqosho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwexesha. Xa urhulumente enika iikhredithi zerhafu kubatyali-mali, oku kunokukhuthaza amashishini kunye nabantu ukuba batyale imali kwiiprojekthi ezintsha, izixhobo, kunye netekhnoloji. Olu tyalo-mali lunokukhokelela ekwandeni kwemveliso, ukudalwa kwemisebenzi emitsha, kunye nokuphuculwa kobuchwepheshe, konke oku kunokukhuthaza ukukhula koqoqosho.

Kwelinye icala:
A. Ukusetyenziswa ngokukhawuleza kobutyebi bendalo kunokukhokelela ekuphelelweni kwezixhobo kunye neengxaki zokusingqongileyo, ezingenakuxhasa ukukhula koqoqosho oluzinzileyo.
B. Izinga eliphezulu lokungafundi kwabantu abadala linokuthintela ukukhula koqoqosho kuba abantu abangenamfundo banokungabi namakhono afunekayo kwimakethi yemisebenzi yanamhlanje.
C. Isitokhwe esiwayo sempahla enkulu sinokubonisa ukwehla kwemveliso kunye nokungabikho kotyalo-mali, nto leyo enokuthintela ukukhula koqoqosho.

Ngoko ke, iikhredithi zerhafu yotyalo-mali (D) zinokukhuthaza ukukhula koqoqosho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwexesha.

Question:
Uqoqosho lukwimeko enzulu yokudodobala. Ukunikezelwa kwale meko yezoqoqosho zeziphi kwezi ngxelo zilandelayo malunga nomgaqo-nkqubo wemali ochanekileyo?
A.Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwandisa uya kuyenza mandundu ngakumbi imeko yokudodobala kwezoqoqosho.
B.Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwandisa ukwandisa kakhulu imfuno ehlanganisiweyo ukuba utyalo-mali lunovakalelo kwiinguqu kwizinga lenzala.
C.Umgaqo-nkqubo wokunciphisa ukhuthazo olufanelekileyo lotyalo-mali kunye nokusetyenziswa.
D.Ukuba imfuno yemali ngokugqibeleleyo elastic expansionary umgaqo-mali kusenokuba kakhulu ngempumelelo.
GivenAnswer:
Xa uqoqosho lukwimeko enzulu yokudodobala, umgaqo-nkqubo wemali ochanekileyo unokunceda ukuphucula imeko. Makhe sihlolisise izimvo ezahlukeneyo:

A. **Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwandisa uya kuyenza mandundu ngakumbi imeko yokudodobala kwezoqoqosho.**
   - Le ngxelo ayichanekanga. Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwandisa (expansionary monetary policy) ujonge ukunyusa imfuno ehlanganisiweyo ngokunciphisa izinga lenzala kunye nokwandisa ukubonelelwa ngemali, nto leyo enokunceda ukuphucula uqoqosho oludodobala.

B. **Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwandisa ukwandisa kakhulu imfuno ehlanganisiweyo ukuba utyalo-mali lunovakalelo kwiinguqu kwizinga lenzala.**
   - Le ngxelo ichanekile. Ukuba utyalo-mali lunovakalelo kwiinguqu kwizinga lenzala, ukunciphisa izinga lenzala kuya kukhuthaza amashishini kunye nabathengi ukuba batyale imali ngakumbi, nto leyo enokunyusa imfuno ehlanganisiweyo kwaye iphucule uqoqosho.

C. **Umgaqo-nkqubo wokunciphisa ukhuthazo olufanelekileyo lotyalo-mali kunye nokusetyenziswa.**
   - Le ngxelo ayichanekanga. Umgaqo-nkqubo wokunciphisa (contractionary monetary policy) ujonge ukunciphisa imfuno ehlanganisiweyo ngokunyusa izinga lenzala kunye nokunciphisa ukubonelelwa ngemali, nto leyo enokwenza mandundu imeko yokudodobala kwezoqoqosho.

D. **Ukuba imfuno yemali ngokugqibeleleyo elastic expansionary umgaqo-mali kusenokuba kakhulu ngempumelelo.**
   - Le ngxelo ichanekile. Ukuba imfuno yemali iphezulu kakhulu (elastic), ukwanda kokubonelelwa ngemali kuya kuba nefuthe elikhulu ekwandiseni imfuno ehlanganisiweyo, nto leyo enokunceda ukuphucula uqoqosho oludodobala.

Ngoko ke, impendulo echanekileyo kukuba **B. Umgaqo-nkqubo wokwandisa ukwandisa kakhulu imfuno ehlanganisiweyo ukuba utyalo-mali lunovakalelo kwiinguqu kwizinga lenzala.**

Question:
Itanki ikwimo ye-prism engunxantathu. Ukuba isiseko esingunxantathu sikwindawo eyi-116 yeenyawo zesikwere, kwaye itanki liziimitha ezingama-30 ubude, itanki liza kuba namanzi angakanani xa ligcwele?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Ukufumana umthamo wetanki ye-prism engunxantathu, kufuneka sisebenzise ifomula yomthamo we-prism:

\[ V = B \times h \]

apho:
- \( V \) ngumthamo,
- \( B \) yindawo yesiseko,
- \( h \) bubude be-prism.

Kule meko, sinendawo yesiseko esingunxantathu eyi-116 yeenyawo zesikwere (ft²) kunye nobude be-prism obuyi-30 yeemitha. Kodwa kufuneka siqaphele ukuba ubude bunikwe kwiimitha, kwaye kufuneka siluguqulele kwiinyawo kuba indawo yesiseko inikwe kwiinyawo zesikwere. Siyazi ukuba:

\[ 1 yeemitha = 3.28084 iinyawo \]

Ngoko ke, ubude be-prism kwiinyawo buya kuba:

\[ 30 yeemitha \times 3.28084 iinyawo/ yeemitha = 98.4252 iinyawo \]

Ngoku, singasebenzisa ifomula yomthamo:

\[ V = B \times h = 116 ft² \times 98.4252 ft \]

\[ V \approx 11417.3232 ft³ \]

Kodwa, kubonakala ukuba kukho impazamo kwidatha okanye kwiimpendulo ezinikwe. Masijonge kwakhona ukuba kukho impazamo kwidatha okanye kwiimpendulo ezinikwe. Ukuba sithatha ubude be-prism kwiinyawo njengoko kunikwe kwiimpendulo, sinokufumana umthamo ngokuthe ngqo:

\[ V = 116 ft² \times 30 ft = 3480 ft³ \]

Ngoko ke, impendulo echanekileyo iya kuba:

C. 3480 ft³

Question:
I-K-fold cross-validation
A.i-linear kwi-K
B.i-quadratic e-K
C.cubic e K
D.exponential kwi K
GivenAnswer:
I-K-fold cross-validation yindlela ebalulekileyo ekusetyenzisweni kweemodeli zokuqikelela kunye nokuvavanya ukusebenza kweemodeli zedatha. Le ndlela yahlula idatha yakho ibe yi-K amaqhekeza (folds) alinganayo. Emva koko, imodeli iqeqeshwa kwi-K-1 amaqhekeza kwaye ivavanywa kwiqhekeza eliseleyo. Le nkqubo iphinda-phindwa i-K amaxesha, ngexesha ngalinye iqhekeza elahlukileyo lisetyenziswa njengedatha yovavanyo. Iziphumo zovavanyo zidityaniswa ukuze kufumaneke umndilili wokusebenza kwemodeli.

Makhe sichaze iindlela ezahlukeneyo zokusebenzisa i-K kwi-K-fold cross-validation:

A. **I-linear kwi-K**: Oku kuthetha ukuba i-K-fold cross-validation isetyenziselwa ukulinganisa imodeli enomgca (linear model). Imizekelo yemodeli enomgca ibandakanya i-linear regression okanye i-linear support vector machines (SVMs).

B. **I-quadratic e-K**: Oku kuthetha ukuba i-K-fold cross-validation isetyenziselwa ukulinganisa imodeli enomgca wesibini (quadratic model). Imizekelo yemodeli enomgca wesibini ibandakanya i-polynomial regression enomgca wesibini.

C. **Cubic e K**: Oku kuthetha ukuba i-K-fold cross-validation isetyenziselwa ukulinganisa imodeli enomgca wesithathu (cubic model). Imizekelo yemodeli enomgca wesithathu ibandakanya i-polynomial regression enomgca wesithathu.

D. **Exponential kwi K**: Oku kuthetha ukuba i-K-fold cross-validation isetyenziselwa ukulinganisa imodeli enomgca we-exponential. Imizekelo yemodeli enomgca we-exponential ibandakanya i-exponential regression.

Ngamafutshane, i-K-fold cross-validation yindlela yokuvavanya ukusebenza kwemodeli, kwaye inokusebenza kwiimodeli ezahlukeneyo ezifana ne-linear, quadratic, cubic, okanye exponential models. Ukukhetha uhlobo lwemodeli kuxhomekeke kwindalo yedatha yakho kunye neenjongo zakho zokuqikelela.

Question:
Ziziphi kwezi mpawu zilandelayo ngokuqhelekileyo ezihambelana nokudlwengulwa komhla?
A.ukusetyenziswa kwamandla agqithisileyo
B.icetywe kwangaphambili
C.Ukukhuthazwa ngokwesondo
D.kubandakanya ukusetyenziswa kwesixhobo
GivenAnswer:
Ukudlwengulwa komhla (date rape) ngokuqhelekileyo kubandakanya iimeko apho umntu esetyenziswa ngamandla okanye ephathwa kakubi ngokwesondo ngexesha lomhla okanye umhla ocwangcisiweyo. Kwezi mpawu zilandelayo, ezona ziqhelekileyo zihambelana nokudlwengulwa komhla ziquka:

B. Icetywe kwangaphambili - Oku kuthetha ukuba umhlaseli unokuba enze amalungiselelo okanye izicwangciso zokusebenzisa umntu ngokwesondo.

D. Kubandakanya ukusetyenziswa kwesixhobo - Oku akuyiyo impawu eqhelekileyo yokudlwengulwa komhla, nangona kunokwenzeka kwiimeko ezithile.

Ngokubanzi, ukudlwengulwa komhla kudla ngokubandakanya ukusebenzisa iziyobisi okanye utywala ukuze umhlaseli akwazi ukusebenzisa umntu ngokwesondo ngaphandle kwemvume ecacileyo.

Question:

Ngoko ke, impendulo ichaneke kakhulu ngu:

Question:

Question:

B.Ukunciphisa iziphumo zokuguquguquka kwesampulu

GivenAnswer:
Injongo yesifundo esiphindwe kabini okanye esigqunywe kabini (double-blind study) kukuba:

Isifundo esiphindwe kabini (double-blind study) yindlela yophando apho zombini umqwalaseli (umntu ophanda) kunye nomxholo (umthathi-nxaxheba) bengazi ukuba ngubani ofumana unyango oluthile okanye i-placebo. Le ndlela isetyenziswa ukunciphisa amathuba e-bias (ukukhetha ngokungakhethi) evela kumqwalaseli okanye kumthathi-nxaxheba, ngaloo ndlela iphucula ukuthembeka kunye nokuchaneka kweziphumo zophando.

Question:
Ivenkile enkulu yayisandul' ukuvulwa emva kokuvalwa kweeveki ezimbini ukuze ilungiswe. Ngentsasa yokuvulwa kwakhona, elinye ibhinqa lalithenga xa lawa ngequbuliso laza lophuka umlenze. Emva koko, eli bhinqa lamangalela ivenkile enkulu ngenxa yokwenzakala komntu. Enxibe isuti yakhe, le nkosikazi yathi yakhubeka phezu kwebhakethi yepeyinti eyayilele kwenye yeepaseji. Kwityala, eli bhinqa labiza omnye umthengi ukuba angqine ukuba ngethuba ethenga weva i-thud, wajika wabona umfazi ewela phantsi. Waphinda wangqina ukuba wabona ibhakethi yepeyinti engenanto ilele kwiimitha ezimbalwa ukusuka emlenzeni weli bhinqa. Kwi-cross-examination, umthengi wangena kwi-argumentative exchange kunye negqwetha levenkile. Xa wabuzwa uluvo lwakhe malunga nokuba yintoni ebangela ukuwa kweli bhinqa, umthengi wangqina, "Wawa ngenxa yokuba wakhubeka ebhakedeni. " Wavuma kwi-cross-examination, nangona kunjalo, ukuba eneneni akazange abone umfazi uhambo ebhakedeni. Emva koko igqwetha levenkile labuza umthengi lo mbuzo ulandelayo:"Ukuba awuzange ubone uhambo lwebhinqa ebhakedeni, wazi njani ukuba wawa ngenxa yalo?" Umthengi waphendula wathi, "Kuba isithandwa sam esasithenga nam sandixelela kamva ukuba sabona eli bhinqa likhubeka phezu kwebhakethi. " Igqwetha levenkile enkulu lihamba ukubetha impendulo yokugqibela yomthengi. Ukuba ijaji yetyala iyasitshitshisa isindululo sommangalelwa kwaye ivumela impendulo yomthengi ukuba ime, kungenzeka ukuba kungenxa yokuba
A.impendulo yomthengi yamenywa ngumbuzo wegqwetha levenkile.
B.impendulo yomthengi yayisekelwe kulwazi lokuqala.
C.impendulo yomthengi yayiyingxelo yokuqonda kutshanje.
D.impendulo yomthengi yayiyi-present sense impression.
GivenAnswer:
A. impendulo yomthengi yamenywa ngumbuzo wegqwetha levenkile.

Kwimeko yamatyala enkundla, xa igqwetha libuza umbuzo, impendulo yomthengi kufuneka ihambelane nomxholo wombuzo. Ukuba impendulo yomthengi yamenywa ngumbuzo wegqwetha levenkile, ijaji inokuba iyayivumela impendulo ukuba ime, kuba yayiphendula umbuzo owenziwe ngqo ngelo gqwetha. Le ndlela isebenza nokuba impendulo inokuba ibandakanya ulwazi olungathandekiyo okanye olungathandekiyo kummangalelwa, kuba yayiphendula umbuzo owenziwe ngqo.

Question:
Yiyiphi kwezi zinto zilandelayo eyinyaniso kwi-hypothyroidism?
A.Ukunciphisa umzimba
B.I-myxoedema yangaphambi kwe-tibial
C.Inqanaba le-TSH eliphakanyisiweyo
D.Ukungafuni kwiindawo ezifudumeleyo
GivenAnswer:
Kwi-hypothyroidism, inqanaba le-TSH eliphakanyisiweyo (C) liyinyaniso. I-hypothyroidism yimeko apho i-thyroid gland ingavelisi i-hormone ye-thyroid eyaneleyo. Xa i-thyroid hormone iphantsi, umzimba uzama ukunyusa imveliso yayo ngokukhupha i-TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone) eninzi evela kwi-pituitary gland. Oku kukhokelela ekubeni inqanaba le-TSH libe liphezulu.

Ezinye izinto ezidwelisiweyo azichanekanga kwi-hypothyroidism:
A. Ukunciphisa umzimba - Hypothyroidism idla ngokukhokelela ekutyebeni, hayi ekunciphiseni umzimba.
B. I-myxoedema yangaphambi kwe-tibial - Le yinto edla ngokufumaneka kwi-hyperthyroidism, hayi kwi-hypothyroidism.
D. Ukungafuni kwiindawo ezifudumeleyo - Abantu abane-hypothyroidism badla ngokuba ne-cold intolerance, hayi ukungafuni kwiindawo ezifudumeleyo.

Question:

GivenAnswer:
Iqumrhu likarhulumente kufuneka libandakanye ingxelo yokuhamba kwemali kwezi ngxelo zemali zilandelayo:

Question:
Eli gunya linesi siphene silandelayo solwaphulo - mthetho:"Umntu akanaxanduva lokuziphatha ngolwaphulo - mthetho ukuba ngexesha lokuziphatha okunjalo, ngenxa yesifo sengqondo okanye isiphene, akanawo amandla abalulekileyo okuxabisa ukungalunganga kwehambo yakhe, okanye ukuvisisanisa ukuziphatha kwakhe neemfuno zomthetho. " Ngenye imva kwemini, ummangalelwa wayegcina umtshana wakhe oneminyaka emihlanu ubudala. Njengoko babedlala i-catch ngaphandle, ummangalelwa waphosa ibhola phezu kwentloko yomtshana wakhe, kwaye yaqengqeleka esitratweni. Ngokuzenzekelayo, umtshana wabaleka emva kwebhola kodwa wakhubeka phezu kwe-gutter waza wawa esitratweni. Xa wakhubeka, umtshana wakrwitsha kakhulu iqaqa lakhe waza akazange akwazi ukuphakama. Kwimizuzwana embalwa kamva, ilori enkulu yenkunkuma yayibuyela umva yaza yabaleka phezu komtshana, yambulala. Nangona ummangalelwa wabona ingxaki yomtshana wakhe, akazange azame ukumhlangula. Emva koko, ummangalelwa wabekwa ityala lokubulala ngokungenanjongo. Kwityala, ummangalelwa unike ubungqina bokuba wothuka kakhulu xa ebona umtshana wakhe ewela kufuphi nelori yenkunkuma kangangokuba waqhaqhazela kwaye akazange akwazi ukushukuma de kwaba sekudlule ixesha. Emva kobungqina bommangalelwa, ingqina eliyingcali lanikela ubungqina kubakhuseli ukuba ukusabela kohlobo oluchazwe ngummangalelwa akuqhelekanga xa kwenzeka isiganeko esothusayo ngokwenene. A.Ummangalelwa wayegula kukuphambana okwethutyana.
B.Ummangalelwa wayengenayo imeko yengqondo efunekayo efunekayo ukuze kwenziwe ulwaphulo-mthetho.
C.Ukungaphumeleli kommangalelwa ukwenza kwakungekho ngokuzithandela.
D.Uxanduva lolwaphulo-mthetho lommangalelwa lwathathelwa indawo lolo lomqhubi welori.
GivenAnswer:
Ukuba i-jury ikholelwa ubungqina bommangalelwa kunye nengqina lakhe lengcali, eyona ndlela yokuzikhusela yommangalelwa yeyona ilandelayo:

C. Ukungaphumeleli kommangalelwa ukwenza kwakungekho ngokuzithandela.

Ngoko ke, ummangalelwa akanakubekwa ityala lokubulala ngokungenanjongo kuba wayengenako ukulawula ukuziphatha kwakhe ngenxa yokothuka okukhulu.

Question:
Ziziphi kwezi ngcamango zilandelayo ezigxile kwindlela uluntu olukwazi ngayo ukwenza imisebenzi efunekayo ukugcina ucwangco nozinzo?
A.chrum
B.kwik
C.Ithiyori yokukhetha enengqiqo
D.chrum kwik
GivenAnswer:

Ithiyori yokukhetha enengqiqo (Rational Choice Theory) igxile kwindlela abantu okanye uluntu olwenza ngayo izigqibo ezilungileyo ukuze kugcinwe ucwangco nozinzo. Le ngcamango isekelwe kumgaqo wokuba abantu benza izigqibo ezisekelwe kwingqiqo kunye nolwazi olufumanekayo ukuze bafumane iziphumo ezilungileyo kubo.

Question:
Zeziphi kwezi ngongoma zilandelayo ezixhasa ingxabano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika?
A.I-hegemony enobubele
B.Ukungasebenzi kakuhle kwe-multilateralism
C.Amandla aseMelika
D.Zonke ezi zinto zingentla
GivenAnswer:
D.Zonke ezi zinto zingentla

I-hegemony enobubele, ukungasebenzi kakuhle kwe-multilateralism, kunye namandla aseMelika zonke zingasetyenziswa njengenxalenye yokuxhasa ingxabano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika. I-hegemony enobubele ibonisa ukuba iMelika inamandla okukhokelela ngokufanelekileyo kwaye inokuba yinkokeli elungileyo. Ukungasebenzi kakuhle kwe-multilateralism kubonisa ukuba izigqibo ezenziwa ngamazwe amaninzi zinokuba nzima kwaye zingasebenzi kakuhle. Amandla aseMelika abonisa ukuba iMelika inamandla okwenza izigqibo ezizimeleyo ngaphandle kokuxhomekeka kwamanye amazwe. Zonke ezi zinto zidityanisiwe zinokuxhasa ingxabano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika.

Question:

A.Kuye kwabikwa ukuba kunxulunyaniswa neziganeko eziphezulu zokwaphuka kunye nokufa okuphezulu kwizifundo ezimbalwa
B.Ngexesha lokufikisa kubonakala kunxulunyaniswa nobunzima obuphezulu bezimbiwa zamathambo ekuhambeni kwexesha
C.Ihlala inxulumene nomlinganiselo ophantsi wokwaphuka
D.Kumazwe anomlinganiselo ophezulu wokwaphuka kubonisa ukuba ukutya ubisi kuyingenelo kumathambo.
GivenAnswer:
A.Kuye kwabikwa ukuba kunxulunyaniswa neziganeko eziphezulu zokwaphuka kunye nokufa okuphezulu kwizifundo ezimbalwa

Ukusetyenziswa kobisi olukhulu kuye kwabikwa ukuba kunxulunyaniswa neziganeko eziphezulu zokwaphuka kunye nokufa okuphezulu kwizifundo ezimbalwa. Oku kuthetha ukuba, nangona ubisi luhlala luthathwa njengomthombo obalulekileyo we-calcium kunye nezinye izondlo ezibalulekileyo, kukho uphando oluthile olubonisa ukuba ukusetyenziswa kobisi olukhulu kunokunxulunyaniswa nemiphumo emibi ethile kwimpilo, kuquka ukonyuka komngcipheko wokwaphuka kwamathambo kunye nokufa. Kubalulekile ukuba abantu bacinge ngokutya okulinganiselweyo kwaye bacebise oogqirha okanye iingcali zezondlo malunga nokutya kwabo.

Question:
Umqeshwa wenkampani enkulu yokuvelisa ufumana lo msebenzi utyhafile, kwaye ulandela umsebenzi kuphela ngemali. Umqeshwa wenza kancinci, kwaye akakhuthazwa ngoko ukuvelisa ubuninzi obuphezulu okanye umgangatho ongcono. Ngokwe-F. Herzberg's two-factor theory, eyona ndlela ilungileyo ye-10 yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalo msebenzi iya kuba
A.ukunikela ukunyuswa kunye nomvuzo wenkuthazo kwimveliso enkulu
B.ukuyila ngokutsha umsebenzi ukubonelela ngomngeni kunye nemvo yokufezekisa
C.ukwandisa amathuba okusebenzisana kwezentlalo ngolwazi
D.ukubonelela umqeshwa nge-tide yomsebenzi ophethe udumo olukhulu
GivenAnswer:
Ngokwe-F. Herzberg's two-factor theory, eyona ndlela ilungileyo yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza komqeshwa kukugxila kwizinto ezikhuthazayo (motivators) ezidibanisa nomsebenzi ngokwawo, kunokuba kugxilwe kwizinto ezithintelayo (hygiene factors) ezifana nomvuzo okanye iimeko zomsebenzi. Izinto ezikhuthazayo zibandakanya izinto ezifana nomsebenzi onomdla, amathuba okukhula, kunye nemvakalelo yokufezekisa.

Ke ngoko, impendulo echanekileyo iya kuba:

B. ukuyila ngokutsha umsebenzi ukubonelela ngomngeni kunye nemvo yokufezekisa

Oku kungenxa yokuba ukunika umqeshwa imisebenzi emitsha, imingeni emitsha, kunye namathuba okukhula kunye nokufezekisa kunokunyusa ukuzikhuthaza kunye nokwaneliseka komsebenzi.

Question:
Ziziphi izifo ezingabangeli iintsholongwane ze-herpes?
A.Ukukhubazeka kweentsana
B.kwik
C.Isifo esidluliselwa ngeentlobano zesini
D.Umhlaza
GivenAnswer:
Izifo ezingabangeli iintsholongwane ze-herpes ziquka:

A. Ukukhubazeka kweentsana - Ukukhubazeka kweentsana akubangelwa yiintsholongwane ze-herpes. Kukho izizathu ezininzi zokukhubazeka kweentsana, ezifana ne-genetic disorders, izifo ezithile, okanye izizathu ezingaziwayo.

D. Umhlaza - Umhlaza (cancer) akubangelwa yiintsholongwane ze-herpes. Umhlaza unokubangelwa zizinto ezininzi ezifana ne-genetic mutations, izifo ezithile (ezifana ne-HPV), ukutshaya, kunye nezinye izinto ezibangela umonakalo kwi-DNA.

Izifo ezidluliselwa ngeentlobano zesini (C) kunye ne-kwik (B) zinokubangelwa yiintsholongwane ze-herpes. Herpes simplex virus (HSV) ingabangela izifo ezidluliselwa ngeentlobano zesini (genital herpes) kunye ne-kwik (cold sores).

Question:
Amapolisa afumene icebiso kumntu owayenolwazi oluthembekileyo lokuba indoda ethile yayithengisa icocaine ekhayeni layo. Emva koko amagosa angenise kumantyi ingxelo efungelweyo echaza iimeko ezibonisa unobangela onokwenzeka wokukhutshwa kwesigunyaziso sokukhangela. Umantyi ukhuphe isigunyaziso sokugqogqa iziyobisi kwidilesi yale ndoda. Amagosa asebupoliseni aya kwikhaya yale ndoda aza ankqonkqoza intsimbi yomnyango. Xa kungekho mntu uphendulayo, amapolisa aqhekeza aza angena kule ndawo yokuhlala. Bagqogqa amagumbi akumgangatho wokuqala baza abazange bafumane bungqina bukhohlakeleyo, emva koko baphuma phandle baza baqaphela umnyango owahlukileyo okhokelela kumgangatho wesibini wendawo yokuhlala. Benyuka ngezinyuko baza bangena kwigumbi lokulala eliphezulu. Ngaphakathi egumbini amagosa afumana i-stash ye-cocaine elele kwi-dresser. Njengoko amagosa ayeqhubeka nokukhangela igumbi lokulala, ummangalelwa wangena kwigumbi. Amapolisa abuze ummangalelwa ukuba nguye na le ndoda. Ummangalelwa wazichaza waza waxelela amapolisa ukuba ayekwigumbi lakhe lokulala kwaye wayehlala kumgangatho wesibini wendawo yokuhlala. Ummangalelwa ucacise ukuba le ndoda yayihlala kumgangatho wokuqala kwaye indawo yayo yokuhlala yahlukile kweyommangalelwa. Nangona kunjalo, ummangalelwa wabekwa phantsi kokubanjwa waza wabekwa ityala lokuba ne-cocaine. Ummangalelwa ufake isindululo sokungabandakanyi icocaine ekubeni ingeniswe kubungqina. Isindululo sommangalelwa kufuneka sibe
A.inikwe, kuba isigunyaziso asizange simthiye igama lommangalelwa.
B.kunikezelwe, kuba isigunyaziso asizange sichaze ngokuthe ngqo indawo eza kugqogqwa.
C.ukhanyele, kuba amapolisa ngokusengqiqweni akholelwa ukuba agqogqa indawo yokuhlala yale ndoda ngethuba engena kwindawo yokuhlala yommangalelwa.
D.wakhanyela, kuba isigunyaziso sasifanelekile kwaye sikhutshwe ngesizathu esinokubakho.
GivenAnswer:
Isindululo sommangalelwa kufuneka sibe:

B. kunikezelwe, kuba isigunyaziso asizange sichaze ngokuthe ngqo indawo eza kugqogqwa.

Isigunyaziso sokukhangela kufuneka sichaze ngokucacileyo indawo eza kugqogqwa kunye nezinto ezifunwayo. Kule meko, isigunyaziso sokukhangela sasinikezelwe kwidilesi ethile, kodwa amapolisa agqogqa indawo eyahlukileyo (umgangatho wesibini) ngaphandle kokuba nesizathu esicacileyo sokukholelwa ukuba le ndawo yayinxulumene nommangalelwa okhankanywe kwisigunyaziso. Ukuba indawo yokuhlala yommangalelwa yayahlukile kwaye ingenanto yakwenza nommangalelwa okhankanywe kwisigunyaziso, ke ukungena nokukhangela kwindawo yakhe kwakungekho mthethweni. Ngoko ke, ubungqina obufunyenwe kwindawo yokuhlala yommangalelwa kufuneka bungabandakanywa.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Question:

GivenAnswer:
A. Igama elithi uphuhliso libhekisela kwimeko yoluntu apho kukho inkululeko kuloyiko kunye nokuswela; kukho izibonelelo ezaneleyo zokugcina ubomi kwaye obu bomi bunokubakho kwimeko engenasisongelo, okanye isisongelo esibonakalayo, sokuphazamiseka ngequbuliso.

Question:
Ukuguqulwa ziimpazamo kwi-DNA ukuba:
A.zihlala ziyingozi.
B.kwenzeka kuphela phambi kwe-carcinogens.
C.ukwandisa ukukhula kwethumba.
D.kwenzeka ngokuzenzekelayo ngesantya esisezantsi.
GivenAnswer:
Ukuguqulwa ziimpazamo kwi-DNA ukuba:

D. kwenzeka ngokuzenzekelayo ngesantya esisezantsi.

Ukuguqulwa kwi-DNA (mutations) zenzeka ngokuzenzekelayo ngesantya esisezantsi, kwaye azihlali ziyingozi. Ezinye iimpazamo zinokuba neziphumo ezincinci okanye zingabi naziphumo kwaphela, ngelixa ezinye zinokukhokelela kwizifo okanye ukwanda kweethumba. Kwakhona, i-carcinogens (izinto ezibangela umhlaza) zinokunyusa izinga lokuguqulwa kwe-DNA, kodwa azizizo kuphela ezibangela iimpazamo kwi-DNA.

Question:
Yeyiphi kwezi zilandelayo ezichaza kakuhle imeko emva kokuba ixabiso liphakanyiswe kwimveliso enemfuno ye-inelastic?
A.Ubungakanani obufunwayo a_soze butshintshe.
B.Ubungakanani obufunwayo buya kwanda.
C.Ingeniso iyonke iya kuncipha.
D.Ingeniso iyonke ayiyi kutshintsha.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo echanekileyo ngu:
C. Ingeniso iyonke iya kuncipha.

Xa imveliso inemfuno ye-inelastic, ithetha ukuba abathengi abaphenduli kakhulu kutshintsho lwexabiso. Ngamanye amazwi, utshintsho kwixabiso alubangeli kutshintsho olukhulu kubungakanani obufunwayo. Xa ixabiso liphakanyiswa kwimveliso enjalo, abathengi baya kuqhubeka bethenga phantse ubungakanani obufanayo, kodwa ngenxa yokuba ixabiso liphezulu, ingeniso iyonke iya kuncipha.

Question:
Zeziphi kwezi ngxelo zilandelayo malunga ne-glucose metabolism echanekileyo?

B.I-Glycolysis ifuna i-NADP +

GivenAnswer:

Le ngxelo ichanekile. Ngexesha le-glycolysis, i-glucose (eyine-carbon ezisithoba) yahlulahlulwe ibe ziimveliso ezimbini ezintathu ze-carbon, ezibizwa ngokuba yi-pyruvate.

A. I-Glucagon yandisa izinga le-glycolysis - Ayichanekanga. I-Glucagon yandisa izinga le-gluconeogenesis kunye ne-glycogenolysis, hayi i-glycolysis.

Question:
Indoda yayingumnini wehotele eyayisandul ' ukwakhiwa esixekweni. NgoMatshi 15, le ndoda yafumana umnxeba ovela kumthengisi owayengumthengisi wezixhobo zehotele. Umthengisi wathembisa ukuthengisa le ndoda izicima-mlilo ezili - 1 000 kwihotele yayo. Umthengisi waxelela le ndoda ukuba iindleko zezicima-mlilo ziya kuba yi- $ 35,000 (okanye i- $ 35 nganye), ehlawulwa kwiintsuku ezingama-90 emva kokubeleka. Umthengisi wathembisa ukuba izicima-mlilo zifakwe ungadlulanga owe-15 KuTshazimpuzi. NgoMatshi 16, le ndoda yafowunela umthengisi yaza yasamkela eso sicelo. Ngosuku olulandelayo, le ndoda yathumela le memo ilandelayo kumthengisi:"Nceda ucetyiswe ukuba ndiza kuthatha isaphulelo se-15 ekhulwini sokuhlawula imali kwiintsuku ezisixhenxe emva kokufakwa. " Umthengisi wafumana imbalelwano yale ndoda ngoMatshi 20. NgoAprili 1, umthengisi wathumela ucingo kule ndoda, esithi: "Kuyabonakala ukuba asinayo isivumelwano esinyanzeliswayo. Andiyi kuhambisa izicima-mlilo ngo-Epreli 15 okanye naliphi na elinye ixesha. "Le ndoda izisa isuti nxamnye nomthengisi ngenxa yokwaphula isivumelwano. Umthengisi uqinisekisa ukukhuselwa komgaqo-siseko wobuqhetseba phantsi kwe-UCC. Yiyiphi kwezi zinto zilandelayo eyona ngxelo ichanekileyo malunga nokuzikhusela komthengisi?
A.Ukukhuselwa komthengisi kufanelekile, kuba i-memo yendoda yayinganelanga ukubonisa ukuba isivumelwano sakhiwa.
B.Ukukhuselwa komthengisi kufanelekile, kuba i-memo yendoda yayingahambelani nemiqathango yokunikezelwa komlomo womthengisi.
C.Ukukhuselwa komthengisi akusebenzi, kuba umthengisi akaphumelelanga ukuphendula kwimemo yendoda ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
D.Ukukhuselwa komthengisi akusebenzi, kuba phantsi kwe-UCC umgaqo-siseko wobuqhetseba awusebenzi kwizivumelwano phakathi kwabathengisi.
GivenAnswer:
Eyona ngxelo ichanekileyo malunga nokuzikhusela komthengisi phantsi kwe-UCC (Uniform Commercial Code) kukuba:

Phantsi kwe-UCC, umgaqo-siseko wobuqhetseba (Statute of Frauds) uthi izivumelwano zokuthengisa iimpahla ezixabisa ngaphezu kwe-$500 kufuneka zibhaliwe ukuze zinyanzeleke. Kule meko, umthengisi akaphendulanga kwimemo yendoda eyayifumana ngoMatshi 20, kwaye ngenxa yoko, ukukhuselwa komthengisi phantsi komgaqo-siseko wobuqhetseba akusebenzi.

Question:
Ukulungelelaniswa kwezityalo ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi kwiindawo ezinamaqondo obushushu aphezulu kubandakanya yiyiphi kwezi zinto zilandelayo?
A.I-stomata eninzi

GivenAnswer:
Ukulungelelaniswa kwezityalo ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi kwiindawo ezinamaqondo obushushu aphezulu kubandakanya:

C. I-Spines endaweni yamagqabi

Izityalo ezihlala kwiindawo ezishushu nezomileyo, ezifana neentlango, zihlala zine-spines endaweni yamagqabi. Oku kunceda ukunciphisa umphezulu apho amanzi anokulahleka khona nge-transpiration. I-spines zikwanceda ukukhusela izityalo kwizilwanyana ezidla amagqabi. Ezinye iindlela zokulungelelaniswa zibandakanya i-cuticles ezityebileyo (ezinceda ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi) kunye ne-stomata ezimbalwa okanye ezivulekayo kuphela ebusuku (ukunciphisa i-transpiration emini).

Question:
Ukuqhuba ngokungakhathali komqhubi wemoto kwenzakalise kakhulu omnye umqhubi. Umqhubi wenqwelo-mafutha wakhankanywa ngokuhamba kwindlela engafanelekanga waza wahlawula isohlwayo. Umqhubi wenqwelo - mafutha wayenomda wepolisi wee - $15 000 kuphela kuxanduva lomntu wesithathu kwipolisi yakhe yeinshorensi. Emva ko kunika i-inshorensi yomqhubi ingxelo epheleleyo yezonyango, zonke iintlawulo zonyango, iirekhodi zonyango, kunye nobunye ubungqina obufunekayo bomonakalo, umfaki-bango owenzakeleyo wafuna imida yepolisi. Umfaki-bango wanika isaziso sokuba ibango lokholo olubi liya kufakwa ukuba imida yepolisi ayihlawulwanga ngokukhawuleza. Inkampani yeinshorensi yala ukuhlawula ngaphandle kwengcaciso. Ijaji yanika umfaki-bango owenzakeleyo i- $ 200,000. Umfaki-bango owenzakeleyo ufumene isabelo esayiniweyo kumqhubi wemoto ongakhathaliyo onika umfaki-bango nawaphi na amalungelo ekusenokwenzeka ukuba umqhubi wenqwelo-mafutha wayenawo nxamnye ne-inshorensi yakhe. Ngaba kusenokwenzeka ukuba inkundla iya kunyanzela inkampani yeinshorensi ukuba ihlawule isixa esipheleleyo sesigwebo sejaji kumntu owenzakeleyo phantsi kwezi zibakala?
A.Umda womgaqo-nkqubo yi- $ 15,000 kwaye yiyo yonke into enokuqokelelwa ngumntu owenzakeleyo akukho senzo sokholo olubi kwisivumelwano se-inshorensi.
B.Inkampani yeinshorensi yaphula umnqophiso ochaziweyo wokholo olulungileyo kunye nokuqhubana ngokusesikweni okucacileyo kuzo zonke izivumelwano zeinshorensi kwaye kufuneka ihlawule isixa esipheleleyo sesigwebo.
C.Ukholo olubi lobuqu kwiqela le-inshorensi kwaye i-inshorensi yakhe isabelo sasingekho mthethweni, kwaye umntu owenzakeleyo akanalo ibango lokunyanzela i-inshorensi ukuba ihlawule.
D.Iqela elenzakeleyo kufuneka linyanzelise isigwebo sakhe sonke ngokuchasene nomqhubi kwaye lisenokungaze lilandele i-inshorensi ngaloo mali.
GivenAnswer:
Imeko echazwe apha ibonisa imeko apho inkampani yeinshorensi inokuba iphule umnqophiso wokholo olulungileyo kunye nokuqhubana ngokusesikweni okucacileyo kuzo zonke izivumelwano zeinshorensi. Ngokusekwe kule meko, impendulo echanekileyo iya kuba:

B. Inkampani yeinshorensi yaphula umnqophiso ochaziweyo wokholo olulungileyo kunye nokuqhubana ngokusesikweni okucacileyo kuzo zonke izivumelwano zeinshorensi kwaye kufuneka ihlawule isixa esipheleleyo sesigwebo.

Isizathu sokuba le mpendulo ichanekile kukuba inkampani yeinshorensi inokuba yaphula uxanduva lwayo lokholo olulungileyo ngokwala ukuhlawula ibango ngaphandle kwesizathu esivakalayo. Xa inkampani yeinshorensi isenokuphula uxanduva lwayo lokholo olulungileyo, inokuthi inyanzeliswe ukuba ihlawule isixa esipheleleyo sesigwebo, esingaphaya komda wepolisi. Oku kungenxa yokuba inkampani yeinshorensi inokuba ibeka umqhubi wemoto ongakhathaliyo emngciphekweni omkhulu ngokwala ukuhlawula ibango elifanelekileyo, ngaloo ndlela ibeka umqhubi emngciphekweni wokuhlawula isixa esikhulu sesigwebo. 

Ngokubanzi, izivumelwano zeinshorensi zifuna ukuba inkampani yeinshorensi isebenze ngokholo olulungileyo kwaye iqhubane ngokufanelekileyo neebango ezingeniswe ngabafaki-bango. Ukuba inkampani yeinshorensi iyasilela ukwenza njalo, inokuthi ibenoxanduva lokuhlawula isixa esipheleleyo sesigwebo, nokuba sidlula umda wepolisi.

Question:
Kungoku nje umfuyi wefama ungumnini wengxelo yomhlaba ochongwe "njengoA. " Uphakamile kwiindawo ezimbini ezingabamelwane entabeni. Umfama ungumnini wepasile ethi "B," ebekwe ngaphantsi kwe "A" ecaleni kwentaba. Ngo-2000, umfuyi weefama, owayeneepasile zombini zomhlaba, wakha inkqubo yabucala yokuhambisa amanzi. Le nkqubo yayiquka umbhobho ongaphantsi komhlaba owawunwenwela kuzo zombini iipasile zomhlaba. Amanzi amdaka avela kwipasile ethi "A" akhupha le nkqubo ukuya kumjelo ohambisa amanzi amdaka kamasipala, owawusezantsi kwentaba. Ngo-2005, i-rancher yathengisa ipasile "B" kumfama. I-deed kumfama ayizange iqulethe naluphi na ukukhankanywa kwenkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi ye-rancher. Ifunyanwa kwipasile nganye kukho izindlu ezinkulu ze-ranch-style ezihlala abanini. Kutshanje, idreyini yamanzi amdaka iye yaqalisa ukukhupha ivumba elingathandekiyo ngaphaya kwepasile ethi "B. " Ngenxa yoko, umfama wamangalela umfuyi wefama ngokungekho mthethweni ethandazela umonakalo owenziwe yinkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi. Isigwebo kufuneka sibe sesokuthi
A.i-rancher, kuba i-deed kumfama yayingenayo nayiphi na iminqophiso ethintela ukusetyenziswa komhlaba we-rancher.
B.i-rancher, kuba unobangela ofanelekileyo wesenzo somfama uya kuba yinkathazo, kunokuba ungene ngokungekho mthethweni.
C.umfama, kuba inkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi yayingubangela osondeleyo womonakalo wommangali njengomcimbi womthetho.
D.umfama, kuba umfuyi wefama wayengenalo ilungelo lokuphucula umhlaba wakhe ngendlela eyabangela umonakalo komnye.
GivenAnswer:
Ukusombulula lo mba, kufuneka siqwalasele imigaqo yezomthetho enxulumene nokusetyenziswa komhlaba, imingcipheko, kunye nokungenelela. Makhe sihlalutye iziphakamiso nganye:

**A. I-rancher, kuba i-deed kumfama yayingenayo nayiphi na iminqophiso ethintela ukusetyenziswa komhlaba we-rancher.**
Le mpendulo ayichanekanga. Ukungabikho kweminqophiso kwididi akuyikhuphi i-rancher ekubeni noxanduva lokungenelela okanye ukungcolisa umhlaba womfama.

**B. I-rancher, kuba unobangela ofanelekileyo wesenzo somfama uya kuba yinkathazo, kunokuba ungene ngokungekho mthethweni.**
Le mpendulo inokuba yinyani ukuba umba uphantsi kwenkathazo, kodwa umba apha ubonakala uxhomekeke ekungeneleleni ngokungekho mthethweni, hayi inkathazo. Inkathazo ibandakanya ukusetyenziswa komhlaba okuphazamisayo, kodwa apha kubonakala ngathi inkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi yenza umonakalo ngokuthe ngqo.

**C. Umfama, kuba inkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi yayingubangela osondeleyo womonakalo wommangali njengomcimbi womthetho.**
Le mpendulo inokuba yinyani ukuba inkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi yayingubangela osondeleyo womonakalo. Kodwa oku akukhankanyi ukuba i-rancher wayenoxanduva lokungenelela ngokungekho mthethweni.

**D. Umfama, kuba umfuyi wefama wayengenalo ilungelo lokuphucula umhlaba wakhe ngendlela eyabangela umonakalo komnye.**
Le mpendulo ichanekile. Umgaqo osisiseko wezomthetho uthi umntu akanalo ilungelo lokusebenzisa umhlaba wakhe ngendlela eyabangela umonakalo komnye. Ukuba inkqubo yokuhambisa amanzi eyakhiwe yi-rancher yenza umonakalo kumfama, i-rancher unoxanduva lokulungisa loo monakalo.

Ngoko ke, isigwebo kufuneka sibe sesokuthi **D. umfama, kuba umfuyi wefama wayengenalo ilungelo lokuphucula umhlaba wakhe ngendlela eyabangela umonakalo komnye.**

Question:
Inkosikazi eneminyaka engama-54 ubudala iza eofisini ngenxa yokuba iye yaba neentlungu zokudubula ngamaxesha athile phezu kwesidlele sayo sasekunene kunye nomhlathi kwiiveki ezi-3 ezidlulileyo. Question:

GivenAnswer:
Ngokusekwe kulwazi lwam lwamva nje, izifundo kwi-etiology ye-Schizophrenia zibonise ukuthambekela kwemfuza kule meko, kodwa ezinye izinto ezifana ne-biochemical, i-environmental, kunye ne-psychosocial factors nazo zibalulekile. Makhe sihlolisise ukuba zeziphi kwezi ngxelo zilandelayo ezingachanekanga:

A. I-dopamine egqithisileyo okanye ukuvakalelwa kwi-dopamine kunokuba negalelo.
B. Izigulane ezimhlophe zineempawu ezininzi.
C. Ukuyeka imeko kwi-Third World yi-65%.
D. Izinga eliphantsi le-Schizophrenia elifunyenwe phakathi kwe-Afrika yaseMelika.

Ngokuhlalutya:

A. I-dopamine egqithisileyo okanye ukuvakalelwa kwi-dopamine kunokuba negalelo.
- Le ngxelo ichanekile. I-Dopamine hypothesis ye-Schizophrenia ithi ukwanda kwe-dopamine okanye ukuvakalelwa kwi-dopamine kunokuba negalelo ekuphuhliseni i-Schizophrenia.

B. Izigulane ezimhlophe zineempawu ezininzi.
- Le ngxelo ayichanekanga. I-Schizophrenia ifumaneka kuzo zonke iintlanga kwaye akukho bungqina obucacileyo bokuba izigulane ezimhlophe zineempawu ezininzi kunabanye abantu abane-Schizophrenia.

C. Ukuyeka imeko kwi-Third World yi-65%.
- Le ngxelo ayichanekanga. Izinga lokuphila kunye nokuyeka i-Schizophrenia kwi-Third World alikho phezulu kangako. Enyanisweni, izifundo zibonise ukuba izinga lokuphila kunye nokubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo linokuba ngcono kumazwe aphuhlileyo ngenxa yokuxhaswa kwezentlalo kunye neenkonzo zempilo.

D. Izinga eliphantsi le-Schizophrenia elifunyenwe phakathi kwe-Afrika yaseMelika.
- Le ngxelo ayichanekanga. Izinga le-Schizophrenia phakathi kwabantu base-Afrika yaseMelika alikho phantsi. Enyanisweni, izifundo zibonise ukuba izinga le-Schizophrenia linokuba phezulu phakathi kwabantu abamnyama e-United States ngenxa yezinto ezininzi ezifana noxinzelelo lwezentlalo, ucalucalulo, kunye nezinye izinto ezinxulumene ne-environmental stressors.

Ke ngoko, izibhengezo ezingachanekanga zezi:
B. Izigulane ezimhlophe zineempawu ezininzi.
C. Ukuyeka imeko kwi-Third World yi-65%.
D. Izinga eliphantsi le-Schizophrenia elifunyenwe phakathi kwe-Afrika yaseMelika.
